description:
It`s the same old club room, but the vibe between Io and Ryuu has changed. Have they had a fight? But then again, the others reason, they didn`t get along very well back when they first joined the club... Then, when a fight breaks out, the cold war between the two second-years ends up getting the Battle Lovers in big trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 愛してる! みんな誰かを
